name: Url-Shortener-bot-V2
description: Make short link by using Shortener using API key

DATABASE_NAME.description: Use this option if you want to short only links from the given domains list. Separate each domain by comma, Works only when mode is selected to droplink

DATABASE_URL.description: Use this option if you wish to short every link on your website but exclude only the links from the given domains list. Separate each domain by comma, Works only when mode is selected to droplink

BROADCAST_AS_COPY.description: Enter True if you want the bot to work in Channels also else Leave it as it is

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Enter your Channel ID, Leave this to deafault if CHANNELS set to False. Separate each ID by Space.

OWNER_ID.description: Your Telegram ID and ID of Users you want add as Admin. Separate each ID by comma.
